sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import {Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import ProgressBar from "../../components/ProgressBar"; import Tours from '../../DB/Tuscany.json'; import { setIncrease,setDescrease,setAdultPrice } from "../../slices/counterSlice"; import { setTours } from "../../slices/tourSlice"; export default function BookingDetails () { const {id} = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(()=> { dispatch(setTours(Tours)); }) const adultPriceAmount = useSelector((state) => state.counter.value); const adultCost = useSelector((state)=> state.counter.adultCost); const childPriceAmount = useSelector((state)=> state.counter.value); const childCost = useSelector((state)=> state.counter.childCost); const infantPrice = useSelector((state)=> state.counter.value); const infantCost = useSelector((state)=> state.counter.infantCost); const selectedDay = useSelector((state)=> state.tour.setDate); const selectedTime = useSelector((state)=> state.tour.setTime); const [value,setValue] = useState(''); const handleChange = (e) =>{ setValue(e.target.value); }; return (
{/* Date*/}

Total Adult Cost: {infantCost}
